prod_short_desc: Help Star-Lord grab the stolen mixtape from Nebula!
prod_long_desc:
Join Star-Lord in a LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes Mighty Micros pursuit of villain Nebula. Match Star-Lord’s Milano vehicle against Nebula’s Necrocraft, which features vehicle-bashing reinforced side armor. Star-Lord has a reversible 2-faced head and is equipped with a space blaster to help him retrieve his stolen mixtape element from Nebula. This popular superhero toy for kids includes 2 minifigures with mini legs.
Includes Star-Lord and Nebula minifigures with mini legs.
Star-Lord’s Mighty Micros Milano features dual rear boosters and a translucent-blue windshield.
Nebula’s Mighty Micros Necrocraft features reinforced side armor.
Also includes Star-Lord's space blaster and stolen mixtape element.
Turn Star-Lord's head to show either his face or his masked face.
Multiple Mighty Micros sets to collect, including 76089 Mighty Micros: Scarlet Spider vs. Sandman and 76091 Mighty Micros: Loki vs. Thor.
This popular superhero toy for kids is suitable for ages 5-12.
Star-Lord’s Milano measures over 1” high, 1” long and 2” wide.
Nebula’s Necrocraft measures over 1” high, 1” long and 2” wide.
